alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of central and northeastern Cascade County through 530 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Cascade, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Black Eagle, Ulm, Eden, Malmstrom Afb, Sand Coulee, Stockett, Tracy and Centerville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 263 and 283. Highway 87 between mile markers 4 and 10. Highway 89 between mile markers 68 and 70, between mile markers 74 and 75, and between mile markers 79 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
